DOC.brief_title: Tailored Mobile Text Messaging Reduce Problem Drinking
DOC.detailed_description: The propose development study entitle , Tailored Mobile Text Messaging Reduce Problem Drinking design develop test tailor adaptive text messaging/short message service ( SMS ) intervention individual interested stop reduce alcohol consumption . This intervention include message tailor baseline assessment result ( include drink time ) adaptive ongoing drinking pattern goal achievement via interactive ecological momentary assessment ( EMA ) . Other feature include participant initiated help message support network alert . We conduct beta research 40 problem drinker assess message preference acceptability , conduct pilot test 10 PDs . In Stage 1b , aim test intervention understand mechanisms action different text messaging intervention 200 problem drinker 12-week period . We propose compare four type message : 1 ) Tailored content time message adaptive participant current state ( Stage 1a intervention ) ; 2 ) Tailored content messaging ( adaptive time ) send 3 pm every day ; 3 ) Untailored consequence base message send 3 pm every day ; 4 ) Brief feedback EMA . Assessments complete baseline , weekly EMA via SMS week 12 via web-based follow-up assessment . Primary outcome include drink per drinking day , day heavy drinking , average drink per week measure weekly EMA . Additional outcome include drink related consequence , goal commitment intervention satisfaction . Outcomes use modify intervention prepare large Stage 1c RCT .
